Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

LPWAVEFORMAT

The basic type LPWAVEFORMAT specifies a pointer to a PCMWAVEFORMAT structure.

Discussion

Due to the way the Microsoft Windows waveOutOpen originally worked (which is the API we tried to emulate), you need to cast the PCMWAVEFORMAT address to a LPWAVEFORMAT type before calling AIL_waveOutOpen.

Or, better yet, just switch to the AIL_open_digital_driver function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_open_digital_driver, AIL_waveOutOpen
